alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 1:15AM PST until February 24 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County including Interstate 5. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with extended road closures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow expected overnight into Friday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
